name: Waterville Valley Resort
description: Winter in Waterville is one of a kind. Skiers and riders can enjoy 100% snowmaking coverage across 265 skiable acres, 2,020 vertical ft, recreational NASTAR racing, professionally designed and maintained terrain parks, and more! Family ski days are laid back and hassle-free thanks to our mountain-side amenities. Families can take advantage of our full-service childcare facility, private rentable slopeside spaces, parking lot ski-in/ski-out trails, free resort shuttles, bag checks, lockers, and complimentary bag drops.
